decision_rationale: 5 attempts exhausted across fundamentally different strategies (basic XGBoost, optimized single model, ensemble, calibration, feature expansion). HCDA has never reached 60% target in any attempt (best: 59.21% with severe overfitting in attempt 3). MAE target infeasible with expanded test set containing 2025-2026 extreme gold volatility. DA and HCDA trade off against each other. Model demonstrates genuine economic value (Sharpe 1.83, DA 56.77%) but cannot simultaneously satisfy all 4 targets.
